notes.note:
Fix JavaScript error ("*TypeError: data is null in PrivacyFilter.jsm*") in console which may significantly degrade sessionstore reliability and performance ([bug 1553413][1])

  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1553413

Proxy authentication dialog box repeatedly pops up asking to authenticate after upgrading to Firefox 67 ([bug 1548804][1]) 


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1548804

Pearson MyCloud breaks if FIDO U2F is not Chrome's implementation ([bug 1551282][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1551282

Performance-regression for eclipse RAP based applications ([bug 1555962][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1555962

Can't start two downloads in parallel via `<a download>` anymore ([bug 1542912][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1542912

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 67.0.2 Release
